meanings.definition: The quality or state of being newfangled.
meanings.sent1: Her love for newfanglednesses made her always seek out the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent2: The newfanglednesses of the smartphone impressed the tech-savvy crowd.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa couldn't understand the newfanglednesses of social media.
meanings.sent4: The city's skyline was a testament to the newfanglednesses of architecture.
meanings.sent5: The classroom buzzed with excitement over the newfanglednesses of virtual reality.

meanings.definition: The tendency to adopt new or modern ideas or practices.
meanings.sent1: His newfanglednesses led him to try out the latest fitness trends.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was attributed to its newfanglednesses in marketing strategies.
meanings.sent3: The dog showed newfanglednesses by learning to open doors on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her newfanglednesses in fashion always turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The town embraced the newfanglednesses of renewable energy sources.
